detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Round, lace-trimmed neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties at the front, short sleeves and gathered, lace-trimmed seams on the skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-striped cardigan in soft organic cotton with fine-knit and textured-knit sections. Buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a stand-up collar with gathers and pleats. Gathers at the top, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend containing some cashmere with contrasting colour flatlock seams and vertical seams front and back. Ribbed stand-up collar, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and high slits in the sides.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, double-layered, drawstring hood, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in burnout-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a raw-edge neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Visible seam down the back with a zip at the bottom and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Wide top in an airy cotton and linen weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, short, frilled sleeves with a scalloped trim and a scalloped hem.
Slides in soft leather with square toes and leather linings and insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and contrasting colour trims.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded shaft, elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in soft, gently draping, double-knit cashmere with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a wrapover top with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with decorative embroidery over the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with an embroidered text on the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.

Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reinforced palm sections and reflective details. Elastication at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The gloves have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in a wool weave with satin details. Covered linked button at the front, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft, supple leather with a thin cotton lining. High waist with concealed elastication, a zip at one side and legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.
Tights with a glittery pattern. 50 denier.
Long-sleeved top in slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a button placket, open chest pocket and rounded hem.
Short V-neck blouse in a soft weave with buttons down the front, long sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing with press-studs at the cuffs.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeggings is partly recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Fitted top in transparent, printed, stretch mesh with a small stand-up collar, visible seams and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Short, A-line skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip at the back.
Wool-blend hat in a sturdy rib knit.
Short top in jersey with a shimmering metallic finish. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gentle draping at the top.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hat in loosely braided straw with a narrow imitation suede band. Width of brim approx. 7 cm.

Two-piece set in soft, organic cotton jersey with a sleeveless top and tiered skirt. Patterned top with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative satin bow at the top. Tiered skirt with covered elastication at the waist. Sewn-in puff pants with narrow elastic and a small frill trim around the legs.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulder seams and a gathered seam at the hem.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and flounces. V-neck,a wrapover top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, side pockets and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Slightly wider, straight legs with scalloped hems. Half-lined.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print on the front, short puff sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and a lined, flared skirt in a double layer of tulle.
Sorts vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports top. Narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. The sports top has an elasticated hem.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with an embroidered pattern. Zip at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Hood with a contrasting colour lining.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a round, ribbed neckline. Layered with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shirt in a pima cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in soft, ribbed jersey.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight, relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.
Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist and a zip fly with a button. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
